import "./component CSS/productDetailCard.css" export const ProductDetailCard = ({ product }) => { const { category, features, discount, id, image, offerPrice, price, rating, seller, title, } = product; return( <>

{title}

{category}

₹{offerPrice} ₹{price}{" "} {discount}

Raings: {rating}

Seller: {seller}

Product Details

{featuresList.map((feature,index)=>

{feature[0]}{feature[1]}

)}
); };
